name: Vera MOLNAR  - 2% of disorder in co-operation

metadata.name: 2% of disorder in co-operation #01
metadata.description:
This first NFT "2% of disorder in co-operation #01" is a unique artwork that is part of a series of 14 NFTs all unique in color and composition, numbered from #01 to #14. These are the first and only NFTs imagined and realized by Vera Molnar in collaboration with Galerie 8+4.  
Image credit: Â©Vera Molnar / couleurs contemporaines, 2022
